body_html:
This is trading off computational overhead for memory overhead. I'm not sure this is the right decision.

we could add an extra parameter "fast_saving" or something to "save_weights" and let the users choose what works the best for them

body:
>           This is trading off computational overhead for memory overhead. I'm not sure this is the right decision.

we could add an extra parameter "fast_saving" or something to "save_weights" and let the users choose what works the best for them
